subject: Economy
question_en: What is the gross domestic product (GDP) of Rajasthan in 2020?
question_hi: 2020 में राजस्थान का ग्रॉस डोमन्टरेट (GDP) क्या था?
explanation_en: According to the National Accounts Statistics Office, Rajasthan's gross domestic product (GDP) in 2020 was Rs. 50,895 crore.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान की विविधि पर्यापन परिचय संस्कर्नामे: Rajasthan mein 2020 mein GDP (विविधि) पर्यापन की जांचना में: राजस्थान की विविधि पर्यापन, 2020 में बीतलुक दोन में: राजस्थान की विविधि पर्यापन, 2020 में बीतलुक दोन
explanation_en: In 2020, the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of Rajasthan was Rs. 204,976 crore. The second highest among all the states in India was Himachal Pradesh with GDP of Rs. 75,109 crore. So, Rajasthan's GDP is more than Himachal Pradesh by approximately Rs. 130,000 crore.
